The house is privately situated amid tall fir trees beside a unique rock ridge. The property is prime with easy access to the waterfront where a unique shoreline configuration and sandstone bedrock prevent erosion. There is a foreshore lease for a dock. The 2 bdrm, 2 bath home was built in 1977. The house is one level with a sunken living room, post and beam construction, high ceilings, and spacious living areas. Ceilings are cedar tongue and groove, Siding is horizontal channel cedar. Electric baseboards and wood stove on sandstone hearth. A unique hanging Acorn type fireplace is a centerpiece of the living room.
